inclusion.criterion: Ambulatory (able to perform a 6 minute walk test)
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Able and willing to comply with all the requirements for the study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Moderately severe or severe mitral regurgitation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Moderately severe or severe aortic regurgitation
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Retinal or optic nerve problems or unexplained visual disturbance
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Need for ongoing use of an alpha antagonist typically used for benign prostatic hyperplasia (BPH) (prazosin, terazosin, doxazosin, or tamsulosin)
exclusion.label: unknown
